Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
Generation VIII.Shield: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It spins its tail fins to leap from the water, then viciously bites down on Wingull flying close to the water’s surface.
Generation IX.Violet: It swims at speeds of over 100 knots and battles fiercely with pods of Finizen over prey.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 2 , Motostoke Riverbank , Dusty Bowl , Lake of Outrage South Lake Miloch , North Lake Miloch , Bridge Field , Lake of Outrage ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 2 , Motostoke Riverbank , Dusty Bowl , Lake of Outrage South Lake Miloch , North Lake Miloch , Bridge Field , Lake of Outrage ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Training Lowlands ( Wanderer ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
